dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools
dependencies.name: autoconf

dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools
dependencies.name: automake

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: c

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: cxx

dependencies.description: Flex is a tool for generating scanners.
dependencies.name: flex

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
MozJPEG is a patched version of libjpeg-turbo which improves JPEG
compression efficiency achieving higher visual quality and smaller file
sizes at the same time
dependencies.name: jpeg

dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.
dependencies.name: libtool

dependencies.description: libX11 - Core X11 protocol client library.
dependencies.name: libx11

dependencies.description:
libXcomposite - client library for the Composite extension to the X11
protocol.
dependencies.name: libxcomposite

dependencies.description: libXext - library for common extensions to the X11 protocol.
dependencies.name: libxext

dependencies.description:
This package contains header files and documentation for the XFIXES
extension. Library and server implementations are separate.
dependencies.name: libxfixes

dependencies.description:
X FreeType library. Xft version 2.1 was the first stand alone release of
Xft, a library that connects X applications with the FreeType font
rasterization library. Xft uses fontconfig to locate fonts so it has no
configuration files.
dependencies.name: libxft

dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.
dependencies.name: m4

dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.
dependencies.name: pkgconfig

dependencies.description:
The xbitmaps package contains bitmap images used by multiple
applications built in Xorg.
dependencies.name: xbitmaps

dependent_to.description:
Amrvis is a visualization package specifically designed to read and
display output and profiling data from codes built on the AMReX
framework.
dependent_to.name: amrvis

dependent_to.description:
DISLIN is a high level and easy to use graphics library for displaying
data as curves, bar graphs, pie charts, 3D-colour plots, surfaces,
contours and maps.
dependent_to.name: dislin

dependent_to.description:
Geant4 is a toolkit for the simulation of the passage of particles
through matter. Its areas of application include high energy, nuclear
and accelerator physics, as well as studies in medical and space
science.
dependent_to.name: geant4

dependent_to.description: Grace is a WYSIWYG 2D plotting tool for the X Window System and M*tif.
dependent_to.name: grace

dependent_to.description:
A set of software tools for data acquisition and storage and a
methodology for management of complex scientific data.
dependent_to.name: mdsplus

dependent_to.description:
The Xbae widget set consists of the well known XbaeMatrix widget, and
Caption and XbaeInput widgets.
dependent_to.name: xbae

dependent_to.description:
XNEdit is a multi-purpose text editor for the X Window System, which
combines a standard, easy to use, graphical user interface with the
thorough functionality and stability.
dependent_to.name: xnedit

description:
" Motif - Graphical user interface (GUI) specification and the widget
toolkit
name: motif
